Jan. 17, 2009 D Butlins Mineworkers (First Section Play Off)
Butlins Mineworkers (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest Butlins Mineworkers butlins-mineworkers-first-section
None
First
Hostile Skies
Butlins Skegness (Reds), Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK In this year, the first section was split into two qualifying pools, A and B, the top three from each of which played off for the overall first section places.
The A section result is here: http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/butlins-mineworkers-first-section-a/2009-01-17/
The B section result is here: http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/butlins-mineworkers-first-section-b/2009-01-17/
Prizes: First Prize: The Butlins First Section Trophy & £1,500 and the First Section Champions Banner Second Prize: £900 Third Prize: £650 Fourth Prize: £450 Fifth Prize: £250 Sixth Prize: £250
The Highest Placed Mining Band - The C.I.S.W.O. Challenge Trophy: GT Group Peterlee (6th in Pool B)
May 15, 2009, 7:38 p.m. Oct. 18, 2013, 9:03 a.m.
1 Blackburn and Darwen Band Nick Sheppard
2 Cornerstone Brass Gavin Lamplough
